com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoauth

Class AuthClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoauth.AuthClient

  • public class AuthClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Local client for Auth.

    Encapsulates user level operations, tokens AuthUserSession, handles token caching, and token refresh. Manages Cognito-Web user screens.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CUSTOM_TABS_ACTIVITY_CODE
      A random code the custom tabs activity is launched under.

    • Field Detail

      • CUSTOM_TABS_ACTIVITY_CODE

        public static final int CUSTOM_TABS_ACTIVITY_CODE
        A random code the custom tabs activity is launched under. This is needed by clients to listen for the result.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • signOut

        public void signOut()
        Signs-out a user.

        Clears cached tokens for the user. Launches the sign-out Cognito web end-point to clear all Cognito Auth cookies stored by Chrome.

      • signOut

        public void signOut(java.lang.String browserPackage)
        Signs-out a user.

        Clears cached tokens for the user. Launches the sign-out Cognito web end-point to clear all Cognito Auth cookies stored by Chrome.

        Parameters:
        browserPackage - String specifying the browser package to launch the specified url.

      • signOut

        public void signOut(boolean clearLocalTokensOnly)
        Signs-out a user.

        Clears cached tokens for the user. Launches the sign-out Cognito web end-point to clear all Cognito Auth cookies stored by Chrome.

        Parameters:
        clearLocalTokensOnly - true if signs out the user from the client, but the session may still be alive from the browser.

      • signOut

        public void signOut(boolean clearLocalTokensOnly,
                    java.lang.String browserPackage)
        Signs-out a user.

        Clears cached tokens for the user. Launches the sign-out Cognito web end-point to clear all Cognito Auth cookies stored by Chrome.

        Parameters:
        clearLocalTokensOnly - true if signs out the user from the client, but the session may still be alive from the browser.
        browserPackage - String specifying the browser package to launch the specified url.

      • isAuthenticated

        public boolean isAuthenticated()
        Returns:
        true if valid tokens are available for the user.

      • getTokens

        public void getTokens(android.net.Uri uri)
        Exchanges code in the Uri for with Cognito JWT.

        Checks if the Uri passed to this method is valid. We can avoid a function

        Parameters:
        uri - Required: The redirect Uri.

      • handleCustomTabsCancelled

        public void handleCustomTabsCancelled()
        Properly handles the event where the user cancels out of the custom tabs auth flow either by closing it or navigating back away from it.

        Unbind mCustomTabsServiceConnection
